title: Contant DC since last update
body:
Since the most recent update, I've been experiencing a "Disconnect" every 30 - 50 seconds. All animations stop, the movements of players are relatively accurate, I can see health going down, but cant see why, and when something dies. it doesn't act dead, it stands their on zero health.

I don't know if its league side or my side, but I've run the ping test in cmd for an entire day while this has been happening and not lost a single packet, ping never exceeding 350.

I also play other games, (mainly overwatch, csgo, and GTA online) and haven't experienced any lag spikes or anything in any of those games, and I've been talking to friends on discord and have maintained communication throughout (I've actually been using them to find out what happen when it happens).

Anyone know why or how I could fix it?
